Author: ldussurget
Text: Dude itâ€™s insane how much I relate. I saw the guy that assaulted me for the first time since it happened (almost 2 fucking years) literally 30 minutes before my job interview.   I froze and had to force myself to run outside to a hidden parking lot so I could have a proper panic attack and ended up having to call someone to pick me up... there was no way I was walking anywhere alone because I felt so terrified/in danger (not just by him, I felt like a danger to myself as well).

Author: cowboyhatcowboyhat
Text: oh god i'm so sorry that must have been really fucking difficult! i really hope you're alright.  if you can i really encourage you to contact the airline, maybe they can refund you or reschedule you - because this situation is clearly not your fault. but most importantly hope you are doing ok, sending you love x
